title: Publications
cleaned_text:
Here is a selection of publications and other written materials by Doctors for Covid Ethics and signatories.

* Doctors for Covid Ethics signatories comment in their own capacity. Publications do not necessarily represent the views of all signatories.

Notes and recommendations for conducting post-mortem examination (autopsy) of persons deceased in connection with COVID vaccination

Shots and Shingles: What Do They Tell Us? We explain why reports of shingles and Bell’s Palsy following COVID-19 vaccination point to dangerous immunosuppression, with short and long-term implications, including for cancer and pregnancy.

Letter to Physicians: Four New Scientific Discoveries Regarding the Safety and Efficacy of COVID-19 Vaccines This letter was send to tens of thousands of doctors in Europe by Doctors for Covid Ethics, warning that new evidence forces physicians to re-evaluate the merits of COVID-19 vaccination.

Founding signatories Professor Karina Reiss and Professor Sucharit Bhakdi provide the facts and figures required to arrive at your own understanding of the Covid-19 crisis.

The PCR Disaster – Genesis and Evolution of the Drosten Test: with contribution by Professor Ulrike Kammerer, 2021 This book traces the origins of the PCR test, which now determines fundamental rights restrictions worldwide. “In their superiority, [they] don’t even bother to pretend to be scientific any more”, says Doctors for Covid Ethics signatory Professor Ulrike Kammerer

History is littered with examples of the atrocities which ensue when doctors abandon their traditional principles in favour of government diktat, writes Dr Janet Menage .

opengraph.description: Here is a selection of publications and other written materials by Doctors for Covid Ethics and signatories. * Doctors for Covid Ethics signatories comment in their own capacity. Publications do not necessarily represent the views of all signatories. Investigation of metallic contaminations found in vector- and mRNA-based COVID-19-”vaccines”: Preliminary Results Three of the four gene-based COVID-19 “vaccines” are contaminated with an abundance of metallic particles.
